# 游品位 APP 分析



##  获取热门游戏列表

```
curl -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -H 'X-Ypw-Token: ' -H 'User-Agent: %7B%22Android_id%22%3A%2263616f1e14305b56%22%2C%22ID%22%3A%22LMY47I%22%2C%22Manufacturer%22%3A%22OPPO%22%2C%22Model%22%3A%22OPPO+A59s%22%2C%22Serial%22%3A%22PZYD9T4LZSNJCYVO%22%7D' -H 'Host: ypw.netease.com' --compressed 'https://ypw.netease.com/api/v2/games/new?limit=10&offset=0&manufacture=OPPO&model=OPPO%20A59s&mode=brief'


```
